I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

here ?

LGTM http://codereview.appspot.com/6298079/diff/1/doc/devel/release.html File doc/devel/release.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6298079/diff/1/doc/devel/release.html#newcode50 doc/devel/release.html:50: of maps using struct or array keys: On 2012/06/14 01:41:51, dfc wrote: > do you need a
here ? nope
